title: Graviditet Vikt Ökning Kalkylator
description: Beräkna recommended weight gain during pregnancy
metaDescription: Gratis pregnancy weight gain calculator - Get personalized recommendations baserat på IOM guidelines according to your pre-pregnancy BMI.

info.title: Om Graviditet Vikt Ökning
info.description: Vikt gain during pregnancy is essential for the health of both mother and baby. The Institute of Medicine (IOM) recommendations vary baserat på pre-pregnancy BMI and whether it's a twin pregnancy.
info.guidelines: General guidelines: During the first trimester, weight gain is minimal (1-4 lbs). In the second and third trimesters, weight gain is steady and progressive baserat på BMI category.
info.limitations: This calculator provides general estimates baserat på IOM guidelines. Always consult with your doctor or healthcare provider for personalized recommendations baserat på your individual situation.
